I hope you both learned some things about online applications today. # For example, it is important to tell an employer information about yourself that is related to the job. # Also, you want to be honest on your application and list references that can talk about your skills as an employee.
Yeah. # And you also want to be sure to select the correct buttons for questions about yourself, like whether or not you graduated from high school.
Jordan, yes. # Let's hope you do not make that mistake again.
_user_, you really helped me today! # Thank you so much! # See you two next time.
_user_ and Jordan, hello.

_user_ and Cristina, hi. # I'm glad you are both here. # I'm getting ready to apply for a new job working at the Eastside Grill but I need some help filling out the application online. # I'm not so good with computers.
Jordan, that's great. # We can look at your resume and help you fill out applications.
That sounds perfect. # _user_, I have a few problem areas I think you can help me with.
Here is the first question that i am having trouble with.

Question.text: The Eastside Grill is saying that to fill out their application, I should be prepared to give them certain information. # _user_, which information do they want? # I think all of this information is important. # Please select one of the choices for me.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The best answer is Experience, education, and contact information. # All of these things are important for an employer to have in order to hire you. # The first answer is not correct because it says you should include your credit history. # You will not need to provide this for a job application, and remember to always be careful in giving out personal information. # The third answer is not correct because family history is not important for an application to work at the eastside grill.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: Ok, Got it. # This is really helping me to better understand.

Question.text: _user_, Here's the next question. # Why is important to be completely honest when filling out an application? # I think it is important to be honest, but my mom said it's ok sometimes to tell a small lie. # So i'm not too sure about how to answer this one. # Will you select an answer for me?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The second and third choices do not say anything about how lying will affect your chances of being hired. # The reason you are filling out an application is to get a job. # The first choice is the correct one because dishonesty could result in not being hired. # You should always provide correct and up to date information. # Any mistakes could cost you the job.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: _user_, Please select an answer choice.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: Oh, that is important information to remember.

Question.text: _user_, Which position do you think I should apply for? # Check my resume if you need.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Server is a good choice based on Jordan's information. # However, he could always apply for any open position.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: That is a great choice! # I enjoy serving customers and I have the experience.

Question.text: _user_ ,I'm not sure which skills best show that I can talk to customers. # What would you choose? # Just type your answer below. # The answer choices are underlined in this job posting I found.

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.text: Communication skills would be the best answer. # Communication is the sharing of information. # Being able to talk to customers and find out what they need would mean you have good communication skills. # However, a positive attitude might help too.

Answer.name: BadAnswer
Answer.text: Being well-organized is not what I was looking for. # Someone could be very well organized but not be able to have a conversation.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The best answer would be communication skills or even just having a positive attitude. # Being able to talk to customers to find out what they need would show you have good communication skills.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please type an answer.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: Communication skills are important in talking with customers. # I didn't even consider it. # Awesome!

Answer.name: GoodAnswer
Answer.text: Communication skills would be the best answer. # Communication is the sharing of information. # Being able to talk to customers to figure out what they need would mean you have good communication skills. # However, a positive attitude might help too.

Question.text: Let's keep looking at the application. # Has Jordan ever been employed by Eastside Grill restaurants before? # Jordan has selected the box for no. # Let's refer to Jordan's resume to double check his answers for this section. # Please press the button at the bottom for yes or no to respond.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The correct answer is yes. # We can find this information on Jordan's resume. # He has worked for this company before in a different city. # Always double check your selections because remember dishonesty can result in not getting the job.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: I told you I was not good with computers! # I can't believe I selected the wrong button.

Question.text: Let's keep going. # Look at the section where it asks if Jordan graduated from high school. # It looks like Jordan has marked that he did not graduate. # According to his resume, did Jordan graduate from high school? # _user_, please select yes or no at the bottom to submit your answer.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The correct answer is yes. # Jordan did graduate from high school. # Again, it is important to make sure that you press the correct buttons when filling out a resume or you run the risk of not being hired.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanResponseToCorrect
Answer.text: Oh yeah! # I did graduate. # what a silly mistake! # I am glad we caught it before I turned in my application.

Question.text: Look at the tasks listed below. # Which task is the most related to the open serving position? # _user_, please choose an answer for Jordan.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The best answer is Seated and obtained orders. # This is the best answer because seating and taking orders is experience that can be used in many different restaurants. # Every restaurant may not be the same and some of the tasks listed may not apply to serving at other restaurants.

Answer.text: Please select an answer.
